description: |-
  Monitor allowing to send alerts based on telemetry data

# tsuga_monitor (Resource)

Monitor allowing to send alerts based on telemetry data

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "tsuga_monitor" "monitor" {
  name        = "No logs"
  owner       = "abc-123-def"
  permissions = "all"
  priority    = 1
  configuration = {
    log = {
      queries = [
        {
          filter = "context.env:prod"
          aggregate = {
            count = {}
          }
        }
      ]
      condition = {
        formula   = "q1"
        operator  = "equal"
        threshold = 0
      },
      timeframe = 10,
      group_by_fields = [{
        fields = ["context.env"]
        limit  = 10
      }]
      no_data_behavior        = "alert"
      aggregation_alert_logic = "no_aggregation"
    }
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `configuration` (Attributes) Monitor configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration))
- `name` (String) Display name of the monitor
- `owner` (String) Team ID that owns and manages the monitor
- `permissions` (String) This controls which data the monitor can see
- `priority` (Number) Priority of the monitor (1-5)

### Optional

- `dashboard_id` (String) Identifier of a dashboard related to the monitor
- `message` (String) Message to be displayed if a notification is triggered
- `tags` (Attributes List) List of key/value tags applied to the resource (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tags))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Identifier of the monitor

Optional:

- `log` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration--log))
- `metric` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration--metric))
